| | | \`code\` | `code` | | | \`\`\`code snippet\`\`\` | | {% note info %} [ | Markdown Guide](https://www.markdownguide.org/basic-syntax) [ | Markdown Guide](https://www.markdownguide.org/extended-syntax) {% endnote %} ## Hexo Markdown`(Tag Plugin)`HexoMarkdown```(Tag Plugin)`Plugin ### 1. {% centerquote %} `centerquote`{% endcenterquote %} ```html
blah blah blah
{% centerquote %}blah blah blah{% endcenterquote %} {% cq %} blah blah blah {% endcq %} ``` ### 2. ```yml _config.xml https://github.com/lucidreamiss/ title: subtitle: '' description: '' author: language: zh-CN timezone: 'Asia/Shanghai' ``` ```markdown > ```[language] [title] [url] [link text] > code snippet > ``` ``` - langugae - title - url link text link - link text url url url language title link text title language url `highlight.auto_detect: true` diff + - ```diff _config.yml highlight: enable: true line_number: false - auto_detect: false + auto_detect: true tab_replace: ``` ### 3.note note ```txt {% note [class] %} () {% endnote %} ``` class `default` `primary` `success` `info` `warning` `danger` class {% note primary %} primary note tag {% endnote %} {% note success %} success note tag {% endnote %} {% note info %} info note tag {% endnote %} {% note warning %} warning note tag {% endnote %} {% note danger %} danger note tag {% endnote %} {% note %} undefined class note tag {% endnote %} ```yml themes/next/_config.yml note: # Note style: modern # simple | modern | flat | disabled icons: false # border_radius: 3 # light_bg_offset: 0 # ``` ### 4.label label ```txt {% label [class]@text %} ``` class`note` {% quote %} I heard the echo, {% label default@from the valleys and the heart %} Open to the lonely soul of {% label info@sickle harvesting %} Repeat outrightly, but also repeat the well-being of Eventually {% label warning@swaying in the desert oasis %} {% label success@I believe %} I am {% label primary@Born as the bright summer flowers %} Do not withered undefeated fiery demon rule Heart rate and breathing to bear {% label danger@the load of the cumbersome %} Bored {% endquote %} `label: false` labelCSS ### 5.button button ``` {% button /path/to/url/, text, icon [class], title %} ``` ``` {% btn /path/to/url/, text, icon [class], title %} ``` ID [FontAwesome](https://fontawesome.com/v4.7.0/icons/) ``` {% btn #, %} {% btn #, & ,, %} {% btn #, & , home %} {% btn #, & (), home fa-fw fa-lg %} ```

{% btn #, %}

{% btn #, & ,, %}

{% btn #, & , home %}

{% btn #, & (), home fa-fw fa-lg %}

### 6.tab tabtab ``` html {% tabs [Unique name], [index] %} {% endtabs %} ``` - Unique name: Tabid - index: -1 - Tab caption: Unique name - icon: Font awesome ``` plain {% tabs Tab %} 1 2 3 {% endtabs %} ``` {% tabs Tab %} 1 2 3 {% endtabs %} ### 7. ``` {% post_path slug %} {% post_link slug [title] %} ``` `slug` `_post` Markdown `post_path` `permalink` `post_link` `title` `{% post_path hexo-writing-skills %}` ```txt {% post_path hexo-writing-skills %} ``` {% post_link hexo-writing-skills %} ```txt {% post_link hexo-writing-skills %} ``` url `permalink` Markdown ### 8.Gist Gist: ``` {% gist gist_id [filename] %} ``` - gist_id: Gisturl - filename: Gist GistfilenameJavaScript ``` html ``` GistfilenamefilenameGistJavaScriptGist GistfilenameGistfilename {% note warning %} GistgithubCSSgithub {% endnote %} ## ### MarkdownKODOUSSCOSOSS Markdown 1. 2. 3.
